DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine effect fluvastatin pro-thrombotic pro-inflammatory marker aPL-positive lupus non-lupus patient ( primary endpoint ) determine safety fluvastatin aPL-positive lupus non-lupus patient ( secondary endpoint ) . All eligible patient sign IRB-approved consent form screen visit give blood baseline laboratory test . Within week screen visit , patient start Fluvastatin 40 mg daily three month . At three month patient instruct stop study medication follow another three month . Thus , total duration study six month : first three month interventional last three month observational .
